abstract: Tom Waits, whose new album "Bad as Me" is his first in seven years, talked with Jon Parales about recording, working with musicians like Keith Richards and the intelligence of crows.
snippet: Tom Waits, whose new album "Bad as Me" is his first in seven years, talked with Jon Parales about recording, working with musicians like Keith Richards and the intelligence of crows.
lead_paragraph: Tom Waits has been busy doing the dishes. That's what he told Jon Pareles for this Arts & Leisure profile ahead of the Oct. 24 release of Mr. Wait's new album, "Bad as Me" (Anti-).

headline.main: Q. and A. With Tom Waits
